name: Guitar & Piano Tiles Deluxe
description:
Ok, so the aim of the game is NOT to touch the white tiles by tapping ONLY on the black tiles as the screen moves up faster, and faster and FASTER!

You think that sounds easy? Give it a try!

3 Rockin' Game Modes - Classic, Arcade & Zen
Awesome Rock Soundtrack (if you can keep up!)
Silky-Smooth Gameplay
Share your score on FB or Twitter

Works on iPhone & iPad, so are you ready to take the challenge? Remember, don't tap the white tile!
